rules.23:
{5}: Reveal this Identity
 When you reveal this identity, choose "Sonic the Motherfucking Hedgehog", "Ublock Origin", "Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson", or "Scott". If you choose Sonic the Motherfucking Hedgehog, you may ignore all instances of split second for the rest of the game. If you choose Ublock Origin, you may block creatures as though they were blockable and did not have trample or flying (even if effects would state otherwise) for the rest of the game. If you choose Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson, effects you control destroy permanents you do not own as though they did not have indestructible for the rest of the game. If you select Scott, your opponents may mock you for choosing the objectively worst option (in priority order), and then you may unreveal this identity.
